title: My 4 Old Books (gnv64)
description:
This torrent contains 4 old books which are out of print now. All are over 55 yrs old & belong to my  father. They are not in good shape, so I decided to scan & convert them to PDF for postereity! I am sharing them with you here:

1. Arithmetic for Lower Secondary Schools by Gopal Krishna Gokhale
  MacMillan & Co | 1958 | 282 pages | 6.93 mb
  First published in 1902, this book was considered as the bible of arithmetic!

2. Examples in First Year Physics bt Laxmidas G. Patel
  Students Own Book Depot | 1959 | 217 pages | 9.83 mb
  Problems designed to furnish experience in the application of the principles.

3. Science in Our Lives by Ritchie Calder
  New American Library | 1954 | 182 pages | 6.71 mb
  Whether or not you have ever studied science, you will have a better understanding of its miracles when you read this stimulating, fact-packed book.

4. The Palmerston Readers - Book IV
  Blackie & Son | 1940's | 240 pages | 6.32 mb
  Provides good, fresh, and interesting lessons, of a kind to catch the instant  attention of young readers, to foster in them a love of reading, and to cultivate their taste.
